## Hidden{visibility="hidden"}
\newcommand{\pp}[2]{ \frac{\partial #1}{\partial #2} }
\newcommand{\ppnd}[2]{ \frac{\partial^2 #1}{\partial #2^2} }
\newcommand{\der}[2]{ \frac{d #1}{d #2} }
\newcommand{\ppb}[2]{ \frac{\partial \left( #1 \right)}{\partial #2} }
\newcommand{\ppndb}[2]{ \frac{ \partial ^2 \left( #1 \right) }{\partial #2 ^2} }
\newcommand{\dd}[2]{ \frac{\Delta #1}{\Delta #2} }
\newcommand{\ddb}[2]{ \frac{\Delta \left( #1 \right) }{\Delta #2} }
\newcommand{\at}[2]{ \left[ #1 \right]_{#2} }
\newcommand{\att}[3]{ \left[ #1 \right]_{#2}^{#3} }
\newcommand{\fd}[4]{ \frac{{#1}_{#2}-{#1}_{#3}}{#4} }
\newcommand{\ffd}[5]{ \frac{{#1}_{#2}-{2#1}_{#3}+{#1}_{#4}}{#5} }
\newcommand{\hide}[1]{ \color{lightgray}{#1} }
\newcommand{\intV}[1]{ \int_\mathcal{V} #1 \, d\mathcal{V} }
\newcommand{\intS}[1]{ \int_\mathcal{S} #1 \, d\mathcal{S} }
\newcommand{\vec}[1]{ \underline{#1} }
\newcommand{\uv}[0]{ \vec{u} }
\newcommand{\av}[0]{ \vec{a} }
\newcommand{\Fv}[0]{ \vec{F} }
\newcommand{\hl}[1]{ \color{magenta}{#1} }
\newcommand{\hla}[1]{ \color{teal}{#1} }
